permissions: Admins can create inventory estimates. Non-admins can create inventory estimates if they are manager members of the related material supplier or broker.
side_effects: Creates an inventory estimate record and sets the most recent inventory change based on material site, material type, and estimated-at; may send a Slack notification when broker settings enable inventory estimate change notifications.
validation_notes: Requires --material-site, --material-type, --estimated-at, and --amount-tons. --estimated-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp. --amount-tons must be greater than or equal to 0. Material type must be generic or related to the material supplier of the site.

flags.name: --amount-tons
flags.validation: Numeric value greater than or equal to 0.
